Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Launch of Wells Fargo Active Cash® Card
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: Wells Fargo introduced the Active Cash® Card, offering unlimited 2% cash rewards on purchases with no annual fee, appealing to consumers seeking straightforward cashback options.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Introduction of Wells Fargo Reflect® Card
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: The Reflect® Card was launched, featuring a 0% introductory APR for up to 21 months on purchases and qualifying balance transfers, attracting customers interested in managing interest payments.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Banking Inclusion Initiative
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: Wells Fargo announced a 10-year commitment to accelerate access to affordable mainstream accounts and financial education for unbanked communities, focusing on Black, African American, Hispanic, and Native American households.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Launch of Wells Fargo Autograph℠ Card
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: The Autograph℠ Card was introduced, offering 3x points on categories like travel, dining, and streaming services, catering to consumers seeking versatile rewards.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Settlement Over Past Practices
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: Wells Fargo reached a settlement addressing previous issues related to customer accounts, aiming to rebuild trust and improve customer satisfaction.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Introduction of Wells Fargo Bilt Mastercard®
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: Wells Fargo partnered with Bilt Rewards to offer a credit card allowing customers to earn points on rent payments without fees, appealing to renters seeking rewards.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Enhancement of Mobile App Features
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: Wells Fargo enhanced its mobile app, providing credit card customers with improved tools for managing accounts, rewards, and payments, enhancing user experience.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Introduction of Wells Fargo Attune℠ Card
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: The Attune℠ Card was launched, offering 4% cash rewards on eligible purchases for gym memberships, entertainment, and select streaming services, targeting consumers with active lifestyles.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Donation Initiative with Attune℠ Card
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: For applications submitted between June 5, 2024, and May 31, 2025, Wells Fargo committed to donating $50 to Capital Link when customers qualify for the $100 cash rewards bonus, supporting Federally Qualified Health Centers and clean energy resiliency programs.

Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.EVENT NAME: Appointment of New Credit Card Business Head
Wells Fargo Credit Card Business.description: Wells Fargo appointed Ed Olebe, a former JPMorgan Chase executive, to lead its credit card business, signaling a strategic move to expand and enhance credit card offerings.
